data.name: Locked.Text
data.value: The gallery mode and presentation option are locked by your host

data.name: GalleryMode.Help
data.value: Choose Normal mode if you are not sure, for further information please refer to the user guide

data.name: PresentationCategory.Help
data.value: UMG offers 30+ presentations, choose a category to narrow selection

data.name: Presentation.Help
data.value: A presentation is a image/media viewer with its unique look and feel, if you do not know what to choose please visit our sample gallery

data.name: AlbumLogoSize.Help
data.value: When upload an album logo, UMG resize it to this resolution

data.name: SortingMethod.Help
data.value: In default, new added medias appear in top, you can use this option to setup a new sorting strategy, for example, you can choose Taken Date + Title @ Descending Order, so the latest photo(actual taken date) appear in top, when taken date information is not available, medias with title "Z****" appear before "Y****" and "X****"

data.name: Watermark.Help
data.value: A small logo can be attached to every image uploaded in this gallery, use this option to protect your copyright

data.name: SellPhotos.Help
data.value: Sell raw files attached to medias, this task requires you to use UMG-Rate and UMG-ShoppingCart module on same page.

data.name: RootFolder.Help
data.value: A unique folder assigned to this gallery to save all kind of files. When in Normal gallery mode, you can choose an existing folder on your server and enable auto synchronize option above, so UMG scans this folder every few minutes and adds new contents to this gallery, if there is a new folder, UMG creates an new album, if there is a new file, UMG addes it to corresponding album

data.name: WhoCanManage.Text
data.value: Choose users who can manage this gallery

data.name: WhoCanCreateAlbums.Text
data.value: Who can create albums in this gallery

data.name: ResortAll.Help
data.value: Are you sure you wish to resort all albums? this operation may take a few seconds or minutes.

data.name: WillBeApplied.Text
data.value: will be applied to every new photos in this gallery, you can

data.name: UploadNewOne.Text
data.value: click here to upload a new one

data.name: LeaveItBlank.Text
data.value: Leave it blank to turn off this feature

data.name: GoogleMapsAPIKey.Help
data.value: UMG-Map module can be used together with this module to show the place where a photo was taken, to use this feature you must obtain and enter your API key

data.name: UVG4NotInstalled.Text
data.value: You choosed to integrate with Ultra Video Gallery 4.x, but UVG 4 is either not installed or you failed the permission check, to purchase UVG 4 please visit www.bizmodules.net

data.name: FlashPresentationOnly.Text
data.value: The embed code is only available for flash presentations

data.name: FallbackChoice.Help
data.value: If you choosed a flash presentation above, UMG downgrade to use this html presentation when work on iPhone/iPad or other clients without flash plugin

data.name: SupportedMedias.Help
data.value: Choose one or many kinds of medias to be uploaded in this gallery

data.name: SelectMediaTypes.Text
data.value: You need to select at least 1 type of media to be supported

data.name: VideoNotSupported.Text
data.value: You choosed to support videos but [PRESENTATION] presentation do not support it

data.name: AudioNotSupported.Text
data.value: You choosed to support audios but [PRESENTATION] presentation do not support it

data.name: FlashNotSupported.Text
data.value: You choosed to support flash movies but [PRESENTATION] presentation do not support it

data.name: DefaultUpload.Help
data.value: UMG offers 7 different ways to upload medias, choose the default upload page

data.name: ViewPermission.Help
data.value: Allow view permission to be defined on albums

data.name: EnableViewPermission.Help
data.value: Are you sure you wish to enable view permission in this gallery?\n\nA new "View Roles" option will be available when edit an album which dictates users who can see this album, you must properly configure it because "View Roles" defaults to empty which means nobody can see any albums

data.name: ManageRights.Help
data.value: Users who can manage all albums and medias in this gallery

data.name: AutoSync.Help
data.value: Turn on this option if you upload medias by FTP

data.name: PGUsers.Help
data.value: Users who can create personal galleries in this gallery

data.name: UserKey.Help
data.value: The key in querystring which represent user ID

data.name: MaxAlbums.Help
data.value: The max number of albums an user can create

data.name: CommunityUsers.Help
data.value: Users who can create galleries in this gallery

data.name: ShowCopyright.Help
data.value: Show product name at the bottom of this gallery

data.name: ShowLicenseScreen.Help
data.value: Include "About" link in module top menu

data.name: CropThumbnails.Help
data.value: Crop image thumbnails to have fixed resolution

data.name: CropImages.Help
data.value: When resize an image, crop it at first if its aspect ratio is different with album auto resize definition

data.name: BulkUpload.Help
data.value: This option affects Html 5 Upload only, in default it uploads all selected files at same time, uncheck this option to upload selected files one by one.

data.name: RawFile.Help
data.value: Allow users to attach a raw file to each media

data.name: SaveAsRawFile.Help
data.value: When resize an image, attach the original file as raw file

data.name: GallerySize.Help
data.value: The size of your gallery, the default value is determined by choose presentation

data.name: PermissionSet.Help
data.value: UMG allows you to define various permissions on album level, check this if you would like to set permission by directly entering user name beside role selection.

data.name: DiskQuota.Help
data.value: The maximum number of items an user can upload

data.name: DiskQuotaWaiver.Help
data.value: Selected users are not restrainted by disk quota

data.name: AmazonS3.Help
data.value: This feature allows you to transfer your medias to Amazon S3 server for fast, secure and reliable storage

data.name: UVGIntegration.Help
data.value: If you have Ultra Video Gallery 4.x installed on this website, you can accept video uploads in any format and use Ultra Video Gallery to encode them. The uploaded video will be added to both UVG and this UMG gallery.

data.name: ActiveSocialAPIKey.Help
data.value: UMG is able to notify active social 1.8+ when there is a new media

data.name: AddPhoto.Text
data.value: Add this photo to Active Social

data.name: AddProfileItem.Text
data.value: Post a message to Active Journal

data.name: RssFeed.Help
data.value: A piece of Html code which can be used anywhere to show a RSS subscription link of this gallery

data.name: EmbedCode.Help
data.value: A piece of html code which can be used to embed this gallery to other pages of this website

data.name: PopupWindow.Help
data.value: The URL to open this gallery in a popup window

data.name: MobileDeviceUploader.Help
data.value: Upload photos to this gallery from mobile devices like iPhone

data.name: MobileViewer.Help
data.value: Mobile Viewer is a special UMG presentation designed for smart photos and other mobile devices.

data.name: UseMobileViewer.Text
data.value: Use mobile viewer for mobile devices
